name: Gacha Art! (Deleted Mod and its not mine its by Rima_Katsu)
name_original: Gacha Art! (Deleted Mod and its not mine its by Rima_Katsu)
description:
Hi! This is for the people who wanted the app! 

Someone asked for the PC version even though there's already one 

The PC version unfortunately doesn't work! Can someone help me make a zip for it! I will reply to anyone who volunteers

Credits To Rima_Katsu!

Enjoy! And tell me if there are any issues! 

Also it might look like normal gacha club but its isnt! There's different stuff in it when you click into it just check it out! 

Have a good day or afternoon or night!

P.S: Keep in mind that im a android user so im not exactly good at making Zips!
